Thank you to everyone who took part in PPEtalk today. Your input is highly valued. We hope you’ve enjoyed it. #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q11: What resources do you recommend for those looking for more information on the topic? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q10: The European Week for Safety and Health at Work is 24-28 October. What do you have planned for that? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q9: Can users access further resources through the e-guide? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q8: And what sort of content can people expect to find in the e-guide? #EUhealthyworkplaces
@PPEorg @EU_OSHA Is there any employer on the chat? It is very important to know their opinions about #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q7: Who is the Healthy Workplaces for All Ages E-guide aimed at? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Sustainability and succession planning is the key strategy that require consensus by both employees and employers  #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q6: You describe the e-guide as multilingual. How many languages is it available in? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q5: What practical tools can help? Can you tell us about the Healthy Workplaces for All Ages E-Guide? #EUhealthyworkplaces
.@EU_OSHA @PPEorg also workers with #chronicillness can be particular vulnerable to certain safety & health hazards #EUhealthyworkplaces
@PPEorg @EU_OSHA There is a problem of awareness in the business sector. As well as a lack of education on the worker.#EUhealthyworkplaces
Q4: Can you give some examples of measures at organisation level to promote sustainable working lives? #EUhealthyworkplaces
@EU_OSHA @PPEorg Principal age management now: to retire before 60. Is that a good strategy? No, but it's cheaper. Correct?
Q3: From an OSH perspective, what can be done to help tackle the issues around population ageing? #EUhealthyworkplaces
.@EU_OSHA @PPEorg but what happens when workers already have a #chronicillness or #disability? how #OSH can manage this situation?
How will your Healthy Workplaces for All Ages campagin help to reduce exposure to toxic chemical such as #asbestos? #EUhealthyworkplaces https://t.co/EXx2OfixTL
Q2: Can you describe some of the barriers preventing older people from staying in work? #EUhealthyworkplaces
Q1: Your 2016-17 campaign is Healthy Workplaces for All Ages. What makes this such an important issue? #EUhealthyworkplaces

We are presenting the Healthy Workplaces for All Ages E-Guide in a live chat right now on Twitter! Be sure to #PPEtalk #Euhealthyworkplaces
Hello! This is PPEtalk - a series of chats with the leaders in the health and safety industry. #EUhealthyworkplaces
This is an open forum, so please join in. Don't forget to use the hashtag #EUhealthyworkplaces and to RT any tweets you like.
Starting in 15 minutes: #EUhealthyworkplaces live Twitter chat w/ @EU_OSHA & @PPEorg! #PPEtalk https://t.co/GzNJECDL9v

Join our live Q&A with @EU_OSHA at 3pm BST today.

All welcome.
